com.tobiadeyinka.itunessearch.search

Class PodcastSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tobiadeyinka.itunessearch.search.PodcastSearch

  • public class PodcastSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Podcasts search API endpoint. See Searching the iTunes Store for more details about the parameters. Created by Tobi Adeyinka on 2017. 10. 15..

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean allowExplicit
      allow/exclude explicit content in search results.
      protected int apiVersion
      The version of the iTunes api to use (1/2).
      protected com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode countryCode
      ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the iTunes store to search.
      protected int limit
      The maximum number of item's to return.
      protected ItunesMedia media
      The media type to search for.
      protected ReturnLanguage returnLanguage
      The language to return the result in (only english/japanese).
      protected java.lang.String searchTerm
      The term to search for.
      protected java.net.URL searchUrl
      URL used to search the iTunes store, generated using all the variables of the instance

    • Field Detail

      • searchTerm

        protected java.lang.String searchTerm
        The term to search for.

      • media

        protected final ItunesMedia media
        The media type to search for.

      • limit

        protected int limit
        The maximum number of item's to return. Default is 50.

      • apiVersion

        protected int apiVersion
        The version of the iTunes api to use (1/2). Default is 2.

      • allowExplicit

        protected boolean allowExplicit
        allow/exclude explicit content in search results. Explicit content is allowed by default.

      • countryCode

        protected com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode countryCode
        ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the iTunes store to search. Default is US.

      • returnLanguage

        protected ReturnLanguage returnLanguage
        The language to return the result in (only english/japanese). Default is english.

      • searchUrl

        protected java.net.URL searchUrl
        URL used to search the iTunes store, generated using all the variables of the instance

        Returns:

      • runPreExecutionChecks

        protected void runPreExecutionChecks()
                              throws ItunesSearchException
        check the validity of all required data before executing the search
        Throws:
        MissingRequiredParameterException - if the search term is not set.
        InvalidParameterException - if any of the set parameters are invalid.
        ItunesSearchException

      • execute

        public org.json.JSONObject execute()
                            throws ItunesSearchException
        execute the search
        Returns:
        A JSONObject object containing the results.
        Throws:
        MissingRequiredParameterException - if the search term is not set.
        InvalidParameterException - if any of the set parameters are invalid.
        SearchURLConstructionFailure - if there is an error during url construction.
        NetworkCommunicationException - if any issues occur while communicating with the iTunes api.
        ItunesSearchException
